text: Terry Peder Rasmussen (December 23, 1943 â€“ December 28, 2010) was a serial killer in new Hampshire and California. known as the "Chameleon Killer," was responsible for the murders of Marlyse Elizabeth Honeychurch and her two daughters, Marie Vaughn and Sarah McWaters, whose remains were found in barrels in Bear Brook State Park, New Hampshire. title: Terry Peder Rasmussen
